title: ESS插件严重报错
author: Ares_heizi
txt_content:
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum] [Yum 命令监控] 玩家 Zauber 执行 Residence 插件 res create 1 命令时发生异常!
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum] 异常名称: java.lang.RuntimeException
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum] 异常说明: Essentials API is called before Essentials is loaded.
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum] 简易错误信息如下:
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum]     位于 com.earth2me.essentials.api.Economy.getUserByName(Economy.java:66)
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum]     位于 com.earth2me.essentials.api.Economy.hasEnough(Economy.java:629)
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum]     位于 com.earth2me.essentials.api.Economy.hasEnough(Economy.java:610)
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum]     位于 net.milkbowl.vault.economy.plugins.Economy_Essentials.has(Economy_Essentials.java:223)
[12:41:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [Yum]     位于 pw.yumc.Residence.vaultinterface.ResidenceVaultAdapter.canAfford(ResidenceVaultAdapter.java:44)复制代码这是实际操作产生的提示↑
[12:43:46] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 18/WARN]: [PlaceholderAPI] Plugin PlaceholderAPI v2.10.6 generated an exception while executing task 112
java.lang.RuntimeException: Essentials API is called before Essentials is loaded.
        at com.earth2me.essentials.api.Economy.getUserByName(Economy.java:66) ~[?:?]
        at com.earth2me.essentials.api.Economy.getMoneyExact(Economy.java:131) ~[?:?]
        at com.earth2me.essentials.api.Economy.getMoney(Economy.java:113) ~[?:?]
        at net.milkbowl.vault.economy.plugins.Economy_Essentials.getBalance(Economy_Essentials.java:78) ~[?:?]
        at net.milkbowl.vault.economy.AbstractEconomy.getBalance(AbstractEconomy.java:20) ~[?:?]
        at com.extendedclip.papi.expansion.vault.VaultEcoHook.getBalance(VaultEcoHook.java:220) ~[?:?]
        at com.extendedclip.papi.expansion.vault.BalTopTask.run(BalTopTask.java:48) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[CraftTask.class:git-CatServer-1.12.2-a8d129c]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52) [CraftAsyncTask.class:git-CatServer-1.12.2-a8d129c]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_202]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_202]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_202]复制代码这是后台不断刷的提示↑
ESS版本是EssentialsX-2.17.2.114
PAPI版本是：PlaceholderAPI-2.10.6
尝试过更新PAPI，无效
          重新ESS生成配置文件，无效
另外输入/gc后直接提示null 又是咋回事?

replies.author: 冰吻
replies.txt_content: 降低版本试试使用这个版本EssentialsX-2.17.2.0  不推荐使用新版本
